name: Build It Like Human
description:
Created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, Build It Like Human follows the journey of an intelligent little robot as they try to discover how to build a civilization. They may not get everything quite right, but they're learning new things all the time!

Thankfully, the energy obtained from combining different nearby objects helps to quickly furnish the landscape with flora, fauna, and even buildings. 

Watch in awe as the world around you to comes alive! Who knows what mysteries you'll find? Who knows, we may even find humans! Combine everything because there are so many combinations to discover!
